roleset.name: cause to undergo genocide
roleset.note: GENOCIDE-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01-3. Framed by Claire. (from genocide.01-v)
GENOCIDE-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from genocide.01-n)

example.name: Passive, arg1 only
example.text: All these Holocaust lobbyists get furious if anybody says Jews are n't the only tribe WHNP-2-NONE- to get genocided *-2, but that 's just politics - " Our genocide is better than your genocide ! "

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: Destruction of European Jews is just another step on the journey the Germans, embarked on when they genocided the Hereros in West Africa.
